subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn crashed on the second run while her main rival, Maria Riesch of Germany, took the gold and fellow American Julia Mancuso took the silver.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn crashed on the second run while her main rival, Maria Riesch of Germany, took the gold and fellow American Julia Mancuso took the silver.
